metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23418 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The package glances before 3.2.1 are vulnerable to XML External Entity (XXE) Injection via the use of Fault to parse untrusted XML data, which is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glances - 3.2.3.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glances package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.3.1+dfsg-1').
